thumb.title: HWAAStyle - Make You Mine (メーク・ユー・マイン) ft. Saki 2【Synthesizer V オリジナル】
thumb.description: 「Take a chance on me, baby, and I'll make you mine」 ───── ⋆⋅✰⋅⋆ ───── Earlier this year, I got into a relationship for the first time in over 2 years. This song is a representation of my feelings for my partner! ───── ⋆⋅✰⋅⋆ ───── ✧✦ 歌 / 歌詞 / MV HWAAStyle ‪✧✦ ベースBeakodise ✧✦ イラストTree Bark ✧✦ サキデザインClaudino ✧✦ 特別なお礼Koge Maiku Tachibana Dav-P ✧✦ 使用音声ライブラリSaki 2 Synthesizer V AI ───── ⋆⋅✰⋅⋆ ───── ✧✦ ストリーミング ✦✧ Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/5JoGEFUJPF7YERFg4khsGx?si=668c77f84a7a4fc6Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/song/make-you-mine/1828554909 Bandcamp: https://hwaastyle.bandcamp.com/track/make-you-mine-feat-saki-2───── ⋆⋅✰⋅⋆ ───── インスト・SVP配布: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1UPVrNVHY8NWrG1ydHU4Jb3TRCAKibmZT
